name: Slime Hunter (IndieAlchemist)
description:
Hunt as many slimes as you can before the time's up!

Created for GDL Jam in 72 hours.

Instructions

Use Left/Right Arrow Keys or A/D to move

Use X to attack.

Happy to read your opinion about it!

04/07/2017 :

-Fixed the bug when attacking the slimes

-Fixed the bug with the countdown

-Feature: added screen shake

-Feature: added the text for score

The new version is called Winx32 - bugFixes
